item.title: 企业产品公司称，由于许可证要求，其对华出口可能下降
item.description: 企业产品合伙公司（Enterprise Products Partners）周四表示，美国商务部要求该公司申请对华出口许可证，这可能会影响其乙烷和丁烷的出口。【原文：Enterprise Products Partners on Thursday said its ethane and butane exports could be hurt by a U.S. Department of Commerce requirement that it apply for a license to export to China.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主动驳回对 Binance 的诉讼
item.description: 周四的一份法庭文件显示，美国证券交易委员会自愿撤销了对全球最大加密货币交易所 Binance 的诉讼。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission voluntarily dismissed its lawsuit against Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange, a Thursday court filing shows.】

item.title: 交易日求购困惑
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: Ulta Beauty 上调年度利润预期，本季度业绩因需求回升而向好
item.description: Ulta Beauty 周四上调了年度利润预期，原因是库存损失减少以及新推出的 Milk Makeup 和 K-Beauty 护肤品牌等产品有助于拉动门店需求。【原文：Ulta Beauty raised its annual profit forecast after beating quarterly results on Thursday, as lower inventory losses as well as new launches such as Milk Makeup and K-Beauty skincare brands helped drive demand at its stores.】

item.title: 男子在纽约被控绑架三周试图窃取比特币
item.description: 检察官周三表示，大陪审团已经起诉了一名 37 岁的加密货币投资者，他被指控在曼哈顿高档的 Soho 区绑架了一名商业伙伴长达三周，用电线电击他，并把他吊在楼梯上，试图让他交出比特币密码。【原文：A grand jury has indicted a 37-year-old cryptocurrency investor accused of kidnapping a business partner in Manhattan's upscale Soho neighborhood for three weeks, shocking him with electric wires, and dangling him over a staircase to try to get him to give up his Bitcoin password, prosecutors said on Wednesday.】

item.title: OpenAI 主张在审判中继续对马斯克的营利性转变提起反诉
item.description: OpenAI 表示，应允许其继续对亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）提起反诉，并称特斯拉首席执行官驳回 ChatGPT 制造商索赔的动议 "毫无事实根据"。【原文：OpenAI said it should be allowed to keep its countersuit against billionaire Elon Musk, saying the Tesla CEO's motion to dismiss the ChatGPT maker's claims has "no grounding in facts".】

item.title: 迈耶伯格关闭位于亚利桑那州的美国太阳能电池板工厂
item.description: 瑞士 Meyer Burger 公司周四表示，该公司关闭了位于亚利桑那州的一家美国太阳能电池板工厂，裁减了全部 282 名员工。【原文：Switzerland's Meyer Burger shut down a U.S. solar panel factory in Arizona, cutting all 282 employees, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国要求法官驳回波音 737 MAX 刑事欺诈案
item.description: 美国司法部周四请求法官撤销对波音公司的刑事欺诈指控，该指控源于两起造成 346 人死亡的 737 MAX 飞机坠毁事故，司法部称已与波音公司达成协议。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department on Thursday asked a judge to dismiss a criminal fraud charge against Boeing stemming from two fatal 737 MAX plane crashes that killed 346 people, saying it had reached agreement with the planemaker.】

item.title: 消费者支出减少，好市多季度收入不及预期
item.description: 好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）周四公布的第三季度营收不及华尔街预期，原因是消费者因生活成本上升而减少了大宗采购，尤其是家居用品等非必需品。【原文：Costco Wholesale missed Wall Street expectations for third-quarter revenue on Thursday, as consumers grappling with rising living costs pared back on large purchases, especially of non-essential goods such as home furnishings.】

item.title: Gap 预计关税将影响第二季度毛利率
item.description: Gap 周四表示，由于担心成本上升，该公司预计第二季度的毛利率将受到关税的影响，这使得这家服装制造商的股价在收盘后下跌了 15%。【原文：Gap said on Thursday it expects a hit to second-quarter gross margins due to tariffs amid concerns related to rising costs, sending the apparel maker's shares down 15% after the bell.】

item.title: Zscaler 任命 Kevin Rubin 为首席财务官
item.description: 周四，Zscaler 任命凯文-鲁宾（Kevin Rubin）为首席财务官，其第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，因为企业在网络安全网络解决方案上的支出增加，以应对复杂的网络威胁。【原文：Zscaler named Kevin Rubin as its chief financial officer and beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue on Thursday, as businesses spend more on cybersecurity networking solutions to combat sophisticated online threats.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 Marvell 预测第二季度营收高于预期
item.description: 周四，Marvell Technology 预测第二季度营收将高于华尔街预期，押注于数据中心人工智能工作负载对定制芯片的强劲需求。【原文：Marvell Technology forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, betting on robust demand for custom chips powering artificial intelligence workloads in data centers.】

item.title: 人工智能服务器需求强劲，戴尔上调全年盈利预期，股价上涨
item.description: 戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies）周四上调了年度利润预期，表明市场对其配备英伟达（Nvidia）强大芯片的人工智能服务器的需求不断增长，使得这家计算机硬件制造商的股价在盘后交易中上涨了10%。【原文：Dell Technologies raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday, signaling growing demand for its AI-powered servers that are equipped with Nvidia's powerful chips, sending the computer hardware maker's shares up 10% in extended trading.】

item.title: 英伟达和戴尔将为美国能源部提供下一代超级计算机
item.description: 美国能源部周四表示，将于 2026 年推出的 "Doudna "将采用英伟达和戴尔的技术。【原文：The U.S. Department of Energy on Thursday said its "Doudna" due in 2026 will use technology from Nvidia and Dell.】

item.title: 独家报道白宫考虑清理创纪录的小型炼油厂生物燃料豁免积压计划
item.description: 据三位熟悉该计划的消息人士透露，白宫正在权衡一项计划，以清理小型炼油厂申请美国生物燃料法豁免的创纪录的积压申请，该计划可能包括批准当前的许多申请，并要求业界提供意见，以处理旧的申请。【原文：The White House is weighing a plan to clear a record backlog of requests from small refineries for exemptions from U.S. biofuel laws, which could include approving many current applications and requesting industry input to deal with older ones, according to three sources familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 福特高管称失去联邦资金可能 "危及 "电池工厂
item.description: 福特汽车执行董事长比尔-福特（Bill Ford）周四就华盛顿可能取消支持电动汽车电池制造的生产税收抵免敲响了警钟。【原文：Ford Executive Chair Bill Ford on Thursday sounded the alarm on the potential for Washington to do away with production tax credits that support the manufacturing of electric vehicle batteries.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，现代汽车考虑对美国汽车提价 1%，以应对关税打击
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周四援引知情人士的话报道称，现代汽车正考虑将其在美国的所有产品提价1%，以减轻美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税打击。【原文：Hyundai Motor is considering a 1% price increase on its entire U.S. lineup, looking to soften a hit from U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行：特朗普关税挫折可能加速美国债务上限期限的到来
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）分析师表示，法院阻止美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收大部分进口关税的裁决可能会增加政府在不提高美国债务上限的情况下何时不再有能力支付所有债务的不确定性。【原文：A court ruling blocking most of U.S. President Donald Trump's import duties could add uncertainty around when the government will no longer be able to pay all its obligations without raising the U.S. debt ceiling, Barclays analysts said.】

item.title: 富国银行称美国 OCC 终止了 2015 年同意令
item.description: 富国银行周四表示，美国货币监理署已终止了 2015 年针对该贷款机构的同意令。【原文：Wells Fargo said on Thursday that the U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency had terminated a 2015 consent order against the lender.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒表示，在政策发生重大转变之际将密切关注市场动向
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周四表示，在贸易政策发生重大转变、投资者持有美元资产的意愿可能减弱的情况下，她正在密切关注市场。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said on Thursday she’s closely watching markets amid substantial shifts in trade policy and possible diminished investor desire to hold U.S. dollar assets.】

item.title: 火辣奇多的 "创造者 "输掉了百事公司和菲多利公司的官司
item.description: 百事公司驳回了一名前高管的诉讼，该高管称百事食品饮料公司通过否认他发明了 Flamin' Hot Cheetos 来欺诈和诽谤他。【原文：PepsiCo won the dismissal of a lawsuit by a former executive who said the food and beverage company defrauded and defamed him by denying that he invented Flamin' Hot Cheetos.】

item.title: 白宫称，特朗普亲自告诉美联储主席鲍威尔不降息是个错误
item.description: 白宫发言人卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）说，唐纳德-特朗普总统周四在一次私人会议上告诉美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔，他没有降低关键利率是一个 "错误"。【原文：President Donald Trump told Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell in a private meeting on Thursday that he was making a "mistake" by not lowering key interest rates, White House spokeswoman Karoline Leavitt said.】

item.title: 美国制裁与虚拟货币诈骗有关的菲律宾数字基础设施供应商
item.description: 美国财政部正在制裁一家总部位于菲律宾的公司，该公司被指控为大量虚拟货币投资骗局（俗称 "杀猪"）提供互联网基础设施。【原文：The U.S. Treasury is placing under sanctions a Philippines-based company accused of providing internet infrastructure to a swathe of virtual currency investment scams, better known as "pig butchering."】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比美国贸易法院的裁决可能会延长关税的不确定性
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周四表示，美国贸易法院阻止特朗普政府征收部分全面关税的裁决可能不会消除阻碍美国企业发展的不确定性，因为特朗普政府可能会找到其他征收关税的方式。【原文：A U.S. trade court ruling blocking some of the Trump administration's sweeping tariffs may not clear up the uncertainty that is holding back U.S. businesses, Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said on Thursday, because the administration may find other ways to impose tariffs.】

item.title: Synopsys 暂停年度和季度预测
item.description: 新思科技公司（Synopsys）周四暂停发布年度和季度业绩预测，理由是美国出台了新的限制措施，限制向主要市场中国出口其芯片设计软件。【原文：Synopsys suspended its annual and quarterly forecasts on Thursday, citing new restrictions from the U.S. curbing exports of its chip design software to key market China.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Thoma Bravo 拟以 30 多亿美元出售软件公司 Apryse
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周四表示，收购公司 Thoma Bravo 正在探索以 30 多亿美元的价格出售 Apryse 公司，此前这家文档处理软件供应商已收到潜在买家的兴趣。【原文：Buyout firm Thoma Bravo is exploring a $3 billion-plus sale of Apryse, after receiving interest from potential buyers of the document processing software provider, people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 全球大公司如何应对关税创伤
item.description: 全球各大公司正在制定应对特朗普政府贸易战影响的计划，这凸显了关税的快速变化如何加深了财务规划的不确定性。【原文：Major companies across the world are laying out plans to tackle the fallout from the Trump administration's trade war, highlighting how rapid tariff changes are deepening uncertainty around financial planning.】

item.title: 特朗普召见美联储主席鲍威尔，称他在利率问题上犯了错
item.description: 曾多次抨击鲍威尔的特朗普最近表示，他无意解雇鲍威尔。【原文：Trump, who has repeatedly lashed out at Powell, recently said he has no intention of trying to fire him.】

item.title: 前高盛银行家莱斯纳在 1MDB 案中被判入狱
item.description: 前高盛（Goldman Sachs）银行家蒂姆-莱斯纳（Tim Leissner）因参与涉及马来西亚主权基金 1MDB 的数十亿美元丑闻于 2018 年认罪，周四被纽约一家法院的法官判处两年监禁。【原文：Former Goldman Sachs banker Tim Leissner was sentenced to two years in prison by a judge in a New York court on Thursday after he pleaded guilty in 2018 for his involvement in a multi-billon dollar scandal involving Malaysia's sovereign fund 1MDB.】

item.title: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司向航天初创企业 Firefly Aerospace 投资 5000 万美元
item.description: 美国国防承包商诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司（Northrop Grumman）与萤火虫宇航公司（Firefly Aerospace）周四表示，诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司已向太空初创公司投资 5000 万美元，以帮助生产双方联合开发的火箭。【原文：U.S. defense contractor Northrop Grumman has invested $50 million into space startup Firefly Aerospace to aid the production of their jointly developed rocket, the companies said on Thursday.】
